metadata.title: CVE-2021-38201 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: net/sunrpc/xdr.c in the Linux kernel before 5.13.4 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (xdr_set_page_base slab-out-of-bounds access)by performing many NFS 4.2 READ_PLUS operations.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
